info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 06 at 11:08PM MST until December 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Northern High Plains. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 5 PM MST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds are expected to develop tonight into Wednesday and cause extensive blowing and drifting of snow. Whiteout conditions will cause dangerous travel conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
